system.description:
A clasp of silver or gold (usually without jewels) which protects the wearer from magic missiles (from spells, wands, etc.).

  • Absorbing damage: Magic missiles target and hit the character normally, but the brooch absorbs the damage inflicted.

  • Limited protection: Once the brooch has negated 101 hit points of damage from magic missiles, its power is spent.

  • Once spent: The brooch dissolves, becoming utterly useless.
